resources.string: MasterMind is a game for smart dudes, your goal is to guess the solution of the secret code you are given in only 10 attempts!
ATTENTION! In the right sequence you could have even 2 or more pins of the same colour, so be careful!Good Luck!!!

The code is composed by a combination of small coloured pins: 4 pins for the easy and medium modes, 5 pins in the hard mode!Touch an empty place of the combination to open the box of the coloured pins, then choose the one you want to put in the sequence! Touch one pin you have already chosen to change it with another pin! Click on “Check” once you choosed the sequence you want, and for each attempt you will be given some advices: white pins will appear if you got the right colour of some pins in the sequence, but not the right position; black pins will appear instead if you got the right colour AND the right position of the pin in the sequence.
